title: This paper compares several well known methods and one new method based on Hellinger distance
review:
This paper compares several well known methods and illustrates some connections among these methods, and proposes one new method based on Hellinger distance for seq2seq models' training, experimental results on machine translation and sentence summarization show that the method based on Hellinger distance gives the best results. 

However the originality and significance of this work are weak.
confidence: 4: The reviewer is confident but not absolutely certain that the evaluation is correct
